name: Flame Keeper (itch)
description:
Flame Keeper
a game by SnowToast and ToddTheWraith

The world fell into a complete and utter darkness and all hope is lost. But a lone skeleton wanders the barren wastelands and tries to rekindle the light by bringing the last flame to it's destination. On the way it has to protect the flame from dangerous winds so it can power the desolate machines of old.

Controls are simple WASD and and interaction button (Space, E, F, Return, Right Ctrl)

This is our second try at completing a game for the Ludum Dare. We are very proud of what we ahve accomplished and are very happy to have it finished.
We hope you have fun while plying.
